example.english: Please state your age on the application.
example.spanish: Por favor, indica tu edad en la solicitud.

example.english: We studied many ancient writings from the Bronze Age in my anthropology class.
example.spanish: Estudiamos mucha literatura de la Edad de Bronce en mi clase de antropología.

example.english: The air in the city is polluted.
example.spanish: El aire en la ciudad está contaminado.

example.english: He had a certain air of mystery about him.
example.spanish: Él tenía cierto aire de misterio.

example.english: En el zoológico local hay más de 250 animales.
example.spanish: The local zoo is home to more than 250 animals.

example.english: El jinete ensilló el animal y cabalgó hacia el oeste.
example.spanish: The rider saddled the beast and rode off into the west.

example.english: I really need an answer to my question.
example.spanish: De verdad necesito una respuesta a mi pregunta.

example.english: You have to decide and give us an answer by tomorrow at the latest.
example.spanish: Tienen que decidir y darnos una contestación como muy tarde mañana.

example.english: I like red apples, but my sister likes green apples.
example.spanish: A mí me gustan las manzanas rojas, pero a mi hermana le gustan las verdes.

example.english: My mom has an apple in her garden.
example.spanish: Mi mamá tiene un manzano en su jardín.

example.english: My biggest passion in life is art.
example.spanish: Mi pasión más grande es el arte.

example.english: The school specializes in art and music.
example.spanish: El colegio se especializa en las artes y la música.

example.english: The baby slept soundly through the night.
example.spanish: El bebé durmió profundamente toda la noche.

example.english: The babies happily listened to the lullaby.
example.spanish: Los bebes escucharon felizmente la canción de cuna.

example.english: I had to run to catch the ball.
example.spanish: Tuve que correr para atrapar la pelota.

example.english: He shot the ball at the goalkeeper.
example.spanish: Le chutó el balón al portero.

example.english: The bank gave us a mortgage at a low interest rate.
example.spanish: El banco nos concedió una hipoteca a un tipo de interés bajo.

example.english: These plants grow on the banks of rivers and streams.
example.spanish: Estas plantas crecen en las orillas de los ríos y los arroyos.

example.english: I always make the bed when I wake up.
example.spanish: Siempre hago la cama cuando me levanto.

example.english: There are too many pillows on my bed.
example.spanish: Hay demasiadas almohadas en mi lecho.

example.english: My son can't ride a bicycle.
example.spanish: Mi hijo no puede montar en bicicleta.

example.english: Are we bicycling to the park?
example.spanish: ¿Vamos a ir en bicicleta al parque?

example.english: Magpies are among the most intelligent of birds.
example.spanish: Las urracas son algunos de los pájaros más inteligentes.

example.english: The bird crashed into the sliding doors.
example.spanish: El ave se estrelló contra las puertas corredizas.

example.english: After the accident there were blood stains on the road.
example.spanish: Tras el accidente, había manchas de sangre en la carretera.

example.english: We're not of the same blood, but he has always been my father.
example.spanish: No somos de la misma sangre, pero siempre ha sido mi padre.

example.english: My body aches from running.
example.spanish: Me duele el cuerpo de correr.

example.english: They fished another body out of the river this morning.
example.spanish: Sacaron otro cadáver más del río esta mañana.

example.english: The human skeleton is composed of 206 bones.
example.spanish: El esqueleto humano se compone de 206 huesos.

example.english: Sardines have lots of bones.
example.spanish: Las sardinas tienen muchas espinas.

example.english: He's the author of my favorite book.
example.spanish: Es el autor de mi libro favorito.

example.english: I don't know his number, but you can look it up in the book.
example.spanish: No me sé su número, pero lo puedes buscar en la guía.

example.english: He put her gift in a box and wrapped it with tissue paper.
example.spanish: Puso su regalo en una caja y la envolvió con papel de seda.

example.english: We donated a box full of clothing to the homeless shelter.
example.spanish: Donamos un cajón lleno de ropa al centro de acogida.

example.english: Are they going to have a boy or a girl?
example.spanish: ¿Van a tener un niño o una niña?

example.english: The boy next door helped me carry the bags.
example.spanish: El chico de al lado me ayudó a llevar las bolsas.

example.english: It's an impressive building, with 94 levels and a location in the center of the city.
example.spanish: Es un edificio impresionante, con 94 pisos y una ubicación en el centro de la ciudad.

example.english: That new building is a costly monstrosity.
example.spanish: Esa construcción nueva es una monstruosidad costosa.

example.english: We took the bus to the city.
example.spanish: Tomamos el autobús a la ciudad.

example.english: Has the bus arrived yet?
example.spanish: ¿Ya llegó el bus?

example.english: How is your business going at the moment?
example.spanish: ¿Qué tal le van los negocios de momento?

example.english: He is studying international business at the university.
example.spanish: Está estudiando comercio internacional en la universidad.

example.english: I have to make a call to the bank as soon as it opens.
example.spanish: Tengo que hacer una llamada al banco en cuanto abra.

example.english: I got a call from someone in Buenos Aires.
example.spanish: Recibí un llamado de alguien en Buenos Aires.

example.english: This car can go as fast as 150 miles per hour.
example.spanish: Este coche alcanza las 150 millas por hora.

example.english: The car of her dreams is a red convertible.
example.spanish: El carro de sus sueños es un descapotable rojo.

example.english: I saw a cat feeding her kittens today.
example.spanish: Hoy vi una gata amamantando a sus gatitos.

example.english: Many big cats are in danger of extinction.
example.spanish: Muchos de los grandes felinos están en peligro de extinción.

example.english: I would lend you money if I had it, but I don't even have a single cent with me.
example.spanish: Te prestaría dinero si lo tuviera, pero no llevo encima ni un solo centavo.

example.english: The total cost comes to 47 euros and 30 cents.
example.spanish: El precio total son 47 euros y 30 céntimos.

example.english: The 20th century marked the birth of a new era.
example.spanish: El siglo XX marcó el nacimiento de una nueva era.

example.english: In cricket, scoring a century is a great achievement.
example.spanish: En cricket, marcar una centena es un gran logro.

example.english: I am going to buy an ergonomic chair for my desk.
example.spanish: Voy a comprarme una silla ergonómica para mi escritorio.

example.english: That yellow chair does not match your sofa.
example.spanish: Ese sillón amarillo no hace juego con tu sofá.

example.english: In many Spanish towns, the church is found near the central plaza.
example.spanish: En muchos pueblos españoles, la iglesia se encuentra cerca de la plaza central.

example.english: The church of St. Rose of Viterbo is a a good example of Baroque style.
example.spanish: El templo de Santa Rosa de Viterbo es un buen ejemplar del estilo barroco.

example.english: How many degrees does a circle have?
example.spanish: ¿Cuántos grados tiene un círculo?

example.english: The campers sat in a circle around the fire to play the guitar and sing.
example.spanish: Los campistas se sentaron en un círculo alrededor de la hoguera para tocar la guitarra y cantar.

example.english: I have lived in the city my whole life.
example.spanish: He vivido en la ciudad toda mi vida.

example.english: The city ruled that nightclubs must close at 2 am.
example.spanish: La ciudad decretó que las discotecas deben cerrar a las 2 am.

example.english: My English class begins at 9 am.
example.spanish: Mi clase de inglés comienza a las 9 am.

example.english: Teachers complain that classes are too big.
example.spanish: Los profesores se quejan de que las clases son demasiado numerosas.

example.english: She took off her clothes and got in the shower.
example.spanish: Se quitó la ropa y se metió a la ducha.

example.english: to put one's clothes on
example.spanish: vestirse, ponerse la ropa

example.english: That looks like a rain cloud to me.
example.spanish: Eso me parece una nube de lluvia.

example.english: A cloud of smoke came out when they opened the car door.
example.spanish: Una nube de humo salió cuando abrieron la puerta del coche.

example.english: Cambié el color de las paredes a azul marino.
example.spanish: I changed the color of the walls to navy blue.

example.english: Mis colores favoritos son el verde y el borgoña.
example.spanish: My favorite colours are green and burgundy.

example.english: Our company is dedicated to the development of renewable technologies.
example.spanish: Nuestra empresa está dedicada al desarrollo de tecnologías renovables.

example.english: We really value innovative ideas here at our company.
example.spanish: Valoramos mucho las ideas innovadoras aquí en nuestra compañía.

example.english: Is this Picasso an original? - No, it's a copy.
example.spanish: ¿Este Picasso es original? - No, es una copia.

example.english: This stone is just a copy; the real Aztec Calendar is in a museum.
example.spanish: Esta piedra es una copia; la verdadera Piedra del Sol está en un museo.

example.english: I bought some multi-colored corn at the farmer's market.
example.spanish: Compré maíz multicolor en el mercado agrícola.

example.english: Thanks to the sun, the corn is doing well this year.
example.spanish: Gracias al sol, el maíz va muy bien este año.

example.english: This T-shirt is 100% cotton, so make sure to wash it in cold water.
example.spanish: Esta camiseta es 100% algodón, así que asegúrate de lavarla en agua fría.

example.english: At harvest time, the entire family worked in the fields collecting cotton.
example.spanish: En época de cosecha, la familia entera trabaja en los campos recogiendo el algodón.

example.english: She has visited more than 20 countries in the past year.
example.spanish: Ella ha visitado más de 20 países en el último año.

example.english: They bought a beautiful house in the country.
example.spanish: Compraron una casa preciosa en el campo.

example.english: We walked across a field full of cows.
example.spanish: Atravesamos un campo lleno de vacas.

example.english: The cow will suckle her pups for several months.
example.spanish: La hembra amamantará a su cría durante varios meses.

example.english: There was a crowd of protesters blocking the streets.
example.spanish: Había una multitud de manifestantes que bloqueaba las calles.

example.english: The crowd was trying to get out of the metro.
example.spanish: La muchedumbre intentaba salir del metro.

example.english: There are 366 days in a leap year.
example.spanish: Hay 366 días en un año bisiesto.

example.english: What day is today?
example.spanish: ¿Qué día es hoy?

example.english: Her desk is always really organized.
example.spanish: Siempre tiene bien ordenado su escritorio.

example.english: Five desks will fit in this conference room.
example.spanish: Caben cinco mesas de trabajo en esta sala de conferencias.

example.english: She used a Spanish-English dictionary to finish the translation.
example.spanish: Utilizó un diccionario español-inglés para terminar la traducción.

example.english: Do you think those discs up in the sky are spaceships?
example.spanish: ¿Crees que estos discos que se ven en el cielo son astronaves?

example.english: The video game won't work anymore because the disc is so scratched.
example.spanish: El videojuego ya no funciona porque el disco está muy rayado.

example.english: What is the distance from here to the center of the city?
example.spanish: ¿Qué es la distancia desde aquí hasta el centro de la ciudad?

example.english: I could make out two figures in the distance.
example.spanish: Pude distinguir dos figuras a lo lejos.

example.english: El bebé no se encuentra bien. - Ok, hay que llamar al doctor Reyes.
example.spanish: The baby isn't feeling well. - Ok, we should call Doctor Reyes.

example.english: La novia de Ricky es doctora en economía.
example.spanish: Ricky's girlfriend is a Doctor of Economics.

example.english: My dog is a German Shepherd.
example.spanish: Mi perro es un pastor alemán.

example.english: My coworker is a lazy dog; I'm always having to do his work.
example.spanish: Mi colega es un bribón perezoso; siempre le tengo que estar haciendo el trabajo.

example.english: How much does a large pizza cost? - Ten dollars.
example.spanish: ¿Cuánto cuesta una pizza grande? - Diez dólares.

example.english: dollar bill
example.spanish: billete de un dólar

example.english: I always knock on the door before coming into her room.
example.spanish: Siempre le toco a la puerta antes de entrar en su habitación.

example.english: Languages are the door to a successful career.
example.spanish: Los idiomas son la puerta a una carrera exitosa.

example.english: You look beautiful in your wedding dress.
example.spanish: Te ves preciosa con tu vestido de novia.

example.english: The actress looked stunning in an emerald-green dress for her red-carpet appearance.
example.spanish: La actriz se veía sensasional en un traje verde esmeralda cuando desfiló por la alfombra roja.

example.english: She doesn't have piercings in her ears.
example.spanish: No tiene agujeros en las orejas.

example.english: I think I have an ear infection.
example.spanish: Creo que tengo una infección de oído.

example.english: I wonder how many people live on the earth.
example.spanish: Me pregunto cuántas personas viven en la Tierra.

example.english: This type of earth is perfect for planting lemon trees.
example.spanish: Este tipo de tierra es perfecta para plantar limoneros.

example.english: I ate an egg for breakfast.
example.spanish: Desayuné un huevo.

example.english: She likes to eat scrambled eggs.
example.spanish: Le gusta comer blanquillos revueltos.

example.english: Electricity is needed for the machinery to operate.
example.spanish: Se necesita electricidad para que la maquinaria funcione.

example.english: The electricity between them is undeniable.
example.spanish: La electricidad que hay entre ellos es innegable.

example.english: We've devised a new system that limits energy consumption.
example.spanish: Hemos ideado un sistema nuevo que limita el consumo de energía.

example.english: Those kids are always full of energy.
example.spanish: Esos niños siempre están llenos de energía.

example.english: I can give you some examples of methods that have worked for me.
example.spanish: Puedo darte ejemplos de los métodos que me han dado resultado.

example.english: Can you send us an example of your work?
example.spanish: ¿Puede enviarnos una muestra de su trabajo?

example.english: She has blonde hair and green eyes.
example.spanish: Ella tiene el pelo rubio y ojos verdes.

example.english: The weather in the eye of a hurricane can be very calm.
example.spanish: El tiempo en el ojo de un huracán puede ser muy calmado.

example.english: She protected her face from the cold with her scarf.
example.spanish: Se protegió la cara del frío con la bufanda.

example.english: The expression on her face said it all.
example.spanish: La expresión de su rostro lo decía todo.

example.english: The rose is the flower of love.
example.spanish: La rosa es la flor del amor.

example.english: I have to accept that I'm not in the flower of my youth anymore.
example.spanish: Tengo que aceptar que ya no estoy en la flor de mi juventud.

example.english: I put all my notes in the folder.
example.spanish: Puse todos los apuntes en la carpeta.

example.english: I forgot my folder in the classroom.
example.spanish: Olvidé mi fólder en el aula.

example.english: What's your favorite food? Mine is pizza.
example.spanish: ¿Cuál es tu comida favorita? La mía es la pizza.

example.english: Spinach is one of the healthiest foods you can eat.
example.spanish: La espinaca es uno de los alimentos más saludables que se puede comer.

example.english: I love all games, but hide-and-seek is my favorite.
example.spanish: Me encantan todos los juegos, pero el escondite es mi favorito.

example.english: We're getting together for a game of soccer.
example.spanish: Nos vamos a reunir para jugar un partido de fútbol.

example.english: Mrs. Cuellar waters the plants in her garden every morning.
example.spanish: La señora Cuellar riega las plantas de su jardín todas las mañanas.

example.english: Our house has a front and a back garden.
example.spanish: Nuestra casa tiene un jardín delantero y otro trasero.

example.english: The price of gasoline hasn't gone up in several years.
example.spanish: Hace varios años que no sube el precio de la gasolina.

example.english: I always keep a can of gasoline in the trunk.
example.spanish: Siempre tengo una lata de gasolina en el baúl.

example.english: I spent a lot of money on your birthday gift.
example.spanish: Gasté mucho dinero en tu regalo de cumpleaños.

example.english: The poster was given as a gift in the magazine.
example.spanish: La revista daba el póster como obsequio.

example.english: That girl is six years old.
example.spanish: Esa niña tiene seis años.

example.english: The girl who lives next door is selling cookies.
example.spanish: La nena que vive al lado está vendiendo galletas.

example.english: Take this bag of broken glass to the recycling bin.
example.spanish: Lleva esta bolsa de vidrio roto al recipiente de reciclaje.

example.english: The glass that you ordered for the windows just arrived.
example.spanish: El cristal que pediste para las ventanas acaba de llegar.

example.english: I have to wear glasses to be able to read.
example.spanish: Tengo que llevar gafas para poder leer.

example.english: Have you seen my glasses?
example.spanish: ¿Has visto mis lentes?

example.english: My grandfather spent years looking for gold, but never found it.
example.spanish: Mi abuelo pasó años buscando oro, pero nunca lo encontró.

example.english: We painted the walls gold.
example.spanish: Pintamos las paredes color oro.

example.english: The current government has been rocked by the scandal.
example.spanish: El gobierno actual ha sido sacudido por el escándalo.

example.english: How many countries have a communist government?
example.spanish: ¿Cuántos países tienen un gobierno comunista?

example.english: There are four groups of fat-soluble vitamins: A, D, E, and K.
example.spanish: Existen cuatro grupos de vitaminas liposolubles: A, D, E y K.

example.english: A group of workers went on strike to protest their inhumane working conditions.
example.spanish: Un grupo de trabajadores se fue en huelga para protestar las condiciones laborales inhumanas.

example.english: I play the electric guitar.
example.spanish: Toco la guitarra eléctrica.

example.english: I'm taking guitar lessons.
example.spanish: Estoy yendo a clases de guitarra.

example.english: The price of gasoline hasn't gone up in several years.
example.spanish: Hace varios años que no sube el precio de la gasolina.

example.english: I always keep a can of gasoline in the trunk.
example.spanish: Siempre tengo una lata de gasolina en el baúl.

example.english: There are two official languages in Canada: English and French.
example.spanish: Canadá tiene dos idiomas oficiales: el inglés y el francés.

example.english: Brazilian Portuguese is such a beautiful language.
example.spanish: El portugués brasileño es una lengua tan linda.

example.english: I spent a lot of money on your birthday gift.
example.spanish: Gasté mucho dinero en tu regalo de cumpleaños.

example.english: The poster was given as a gift in the magazine.
example.spanish: La revista daba el póster como obsequio.

example.english: How many laws has the government passed this year?
example.spanish: ¿Cuántas leyes ha aprobado el gobierno este año?

example.english: The laws prohibit the use of company funds for personal gain.
example.spanish: Las reglas prohiben el uso de fondos empresariales para ganancia personal.

example.english: That girl is six years old.
example.spanish: Esa niña tiene seis años.

example.english: The girl who lives next door is selling cookies.
example.spanish: La nena que vive al lado está vendiendo galletas.

example.english: I love receiving handwritten letters via snail mail.
example.spanish: Me encanta recibir cartas escritas a mano por correo normal.

example.english: I just need five letters to complete the crossword.
example.spanish: Me faltan solo cinco letras para completar el crucigrama.

example.english: Take this bag of broken glass to the recycling bin.
example.spanish: Lleva esta bolsa de vidrio roto al recipiente de reciclaje.

example.english: The glass that you ordered for the windows just arrived.
example.spanish: El cristal que pediste para las ventanas acaba de llegar.

example.english: If the water level increases, the dam is opened to prevent flooding.
example.spanish: Si aumenta el nivel del agua, se abre la presa para evitar inundaciones.

example.english: My level of Spanish has increased substantially since I moved to Costa Rica.
example.spanish: Mi nivel de español ha mejorado bastante desde que me mudé a Costa Rica.

example.english: I have to wear glasses to be able to read.
example.spanish: Tengo que llevar gafas para poder leer.

example.english: Have you seen my glasses?
example.spanish: ¿Has visto mis lentes?

example.english: She told me a lie so that I wouldn't punish her.
example.spanish: Me dijo una mentira para que no la castigara.

example.english: They lied about the election results.
example.spanish: Mintieron acerca de los resultados de las elecciónes.

example.english: My grandfather spent years looking for gold, but never found it.
example.spanish: Mi abuelo pasó años buscando oro, pero nunca lo encontró.

example.english: We painted the walls gold.
example.spanish: Pintamos las paredes color oro.

example.english: Life is a wonderful and terrifying enigma.
example.spanish: La vida es un enigma maravilloso y aterrador.

example.english: He traveled to many interesting places during his life, including Timbuktu.
example.spanish: Viajó a muchos lugares interesantes durante su vida, incluso Timbuktú.

example.english: The current government has been rocked by the scandal.
example.spanish: El gobierno actual ha sido sacudido por el escándalo.

example.english: How many countries have a communist government?
example.spanish: ¿Cuántos países tienen un gobierno comunista?

example.english: We danced by the light of the moon.
example.spanish: Bailamos a la luz de la luna.

example.english: Could you turn on the light, please?
example.spanish: ¿Podría encender la luz, por favor?

example.english: There are four groups of fat-soluble vitamins: A, D, E, and K.
example.spanish: Existen cuatro grupos de vitaminas liposolubles: A, D, E y K.

example.english: A group of workers went on strike to protest their inhumane working conditions.
example.spanish: Un grupo de trabajadores se fue en huelga para protestar las condiciones laborales inhumanas.

example.english: The beach made a curved line around the bay.
example.spanish: La playa formaba una línea curva alrededor de la bahía.

example.english: He drew vertical lines on the paper.
example.spanish: Trazó rayas verticales en el papel.

example.english: I play the electric guitar.
example.spanish: Toco la guitarra eléctrica.

example.english: I'm taking guitar lessons.
example.spanish: Estoy yendo a clases de guitarra.

example.english: I always make a list of things that I need before I travel.
example.spanish: Siempre hago una lista de las cosas que necesito antes de viajar.

example.english: I have a really long list of chores to finish this weekend.
example.spanish: Tengo un listado larguísimo de quehaceres que terminar este fin de semana.

example.english: You have to put your hair up to work in my kitchen.
example.spanish: Tienes que recogerte el pelo para trabajar en mi cocina.

example.english: The princess had long blond hair.
example.spanish: La princesa tenía el cabello largo y rubio.

example.english: Love is all you need.
example.spanish: El amor es todo lo que necesitas.

example.english: Your first love doesn't always have to be the love of your life.
example.spanish: Tu primer amor no siempre tiene que ser el amor de tu vida.

example.english: The pianist had small, delicate hands.
example.spanish: El pianista tenía las manos pequeñas y finas.

example.english: He watched the slow movement of the hands of the clock.
example.spanish: Miró el movimiento lento de las manecillas del reloj.

example.english: The new machine helps us do the work much faster.
example.spanish: La nueva máquina nos ayuda a hacer el trabajo mucho más rápido.

example.english: I bought a machine that dices vegetables for you.
example.spanish: Compré un aparato que te pica las verduras.

example.english: He was given a cowboy hat for his birthday.
example.spanish: Le regalaron un sombrero de vaquero por su cumpleaños.

example.english: My mother knitted me a woolly hat.
example.spanish: Mi madre me hizo un gorro de lana.

example.english: There are ten men and six women on my team at work.
example.spanish: Hay diez hombres y seis mujeres en mi equipo de trabajo.

example.english: The manager is that tall man by the door.
example.spanish: El director es ese señor alto que está en la puerta.

example.english: I hit my head on the corner of the cupboard door.
example.spanish: Me pegué la cabeza contra la esquina de la puerta del armario.

example.english: I can't get you out of my head.
example.spanish: No puedo sacarte de mi cabeza.

example.english: Let's find their coordinates on the map.
example.spanish: Encontremos sus coordenadas en el mapa.

example.english: Based on the map, we're two stops away from our destination.
example.spanish: Según el mapa, estamos a dos paradas de nuestro destino.

example.english: Hagfish have four hearts.
example.spanish: Los peces bruja tienen cuatro corazones.

example.english: Her last boyfriend really broke her heart.
example.spanish: Su último novio sí que le partió el corazón.

example.english: She stuffed the turkey with chopped pork meat.
example.spanish: Rellenó el pavo con carne de cerdo picada.

example.english: The film doesn't have much meat to it.
example.spanish: La película tiene poca sustancia.

example.english: The summer heat was unbearable.
example.spanish: El calor del verano era insoportable.

example.english: The heat broke down in the middle of the winter.
example.spanish: La calefacción se estropeó en mitad del invierno.

example.english: Milk helps make growing children's bones stronger.
example.spanish: La leche ayuda a fortalecer los huesos de los niños en etapa de crecimiento.

example.english: The best curries are made with coconut milk.
example.spanish: Los mejores currys se hacen con leche de coco.

example.english: There is a huge hole in my favorite shirt that I need to mend.
example.spanish: Hay un enorme agujero en mi camisa favorita que necesito remendar.

example.english: Squirrels tend to build their nests in the holes of trees.
example.spanish: Las ardillas suelen construir sus nidos en los huecos de los árboles.

example.english: The human mind is unique in the animal kingdom.
example.spanish: La mente humana es única dentro del reino animal.

example.english: I can't get her out of my mind.
example.spanish: No puedo sacarla de mi mente.

example.english: They own a large home in the mountains.
example.spanish: Tienen una casa grande en las montañas.

example.english: Welcome to our home. Please, make yourselves comfortable.
example.spanish: Bienvenidos a nuestro hogar. Por favor, pónganse cómodos.

example.english: Let the egg sit in boiled water for 10 minutes.
example.spanish: Deja reposar el huevo en agua hervida por 10 minutos.

example.english: Just give me a minute please, and I'll be with you.
example.spanish: Permítame un momento por favor, y en seguida le atenderé.

example.english: There are wild horses in the national park.
example.spanish: Hay caballos salvajes en el parque nacional.

example.english: You have to run very quickly and then vault the horse.
example.spanish: Tienes que correr muy rápido y entonces saltar el potro.

example.english: If money was not a concern, I would travel the world in my private jet.
example.spanish: Si el dinero no importara, viajaría el mundo en mi jet privado.

example.english: How much money did you get for your car?
example.spanish: ¿Cuánta plata te dieron por tu carro?

example.english: I'm paid by the hour.
example.spanish: Me pagan por hora.

example.english: A ferry leaves for the island at a quarter past the hour.
example.spanish: Un ferry sale para la isla a un cuarto después de la hora.

example.english: August is usually the hottest month of the year around here.
example.spanish: Normalmente, agosto es el mes más caliente del año por aquí.

example.english: in the month of August
example.spanish: en el mes de agosto

example.english: We bought a larger house when our third child was born.
example.spanish: Compramos una casa más grande cuando nació nuestro tercer hijo.

example.english: The whole house was happy with the news.
example.spanish: Toda la casa se alegró al saber la noticia.

example.english: The full moon lights up the night.
example.spanish: La luna llena alumbra la noche.

example.english: Many moons ago, I too was in love.
example.spanish: Hace muchas lunas, yo también estuve enamorado.

example.english: Can I have a glass of water with ice, please?
example.spanish: Me da un vaso de agua con hielo, ¿por favor?

example.english: The roofs of the houses were covered with ice.
example.spanish: Los tejados de las casas estaban cubiertos de hielo.

example.english: If your cat brings you a dead mouse, it's giving you a gift.
example.spanish: Si tu gato te trae un ratón muerto, te está ofreciendo un regalo.

example.english: The right-click of the mouse is broken.
example.spanish: El clic derecho del mouse no anda.

example.english: El prestigioso científico rechazó inicialmente la idea de un "big bang".
example.spanish: The prestigious scientist initially rejected the idea of a big bang.

example.english: La idea de tiempo es una invención humana.
example.spanish: The concept of time is a human invention.

example.english: I opened my mouth so the dentist could examine my teeth.
example.spanish: Abrí la boca para que el dentista pudiera examinar mis dientes.

example.english: We finally arrived at the mouth of the tunnel.
example.spanish: Por fin llegamos a la entrada del túnel.

example.english: The table measures 60 inches in length and 40 in width.
example.spanish: La mesa mide 60 pulgadas de largo y 40 de ancho.

example.english: When we got up in the morning, there were five inches of snow.
example.spanish: Cuando nos levantamos por la mañana, había cinco dedos de nieve.

example.english: My uncle is a famous actor who's been in a lot of movies.
example.spanish: Mi tío es un actor famoso que ha salido en muchas películas.

example.english: There's a really good movie about the Second World War that just came out.
example.spanish: Hay un film muy bueno sobre la Segunda Guerra Mundial que acaba de salir.

example.english: The development of industry has brought economic growth to the country.
example.spanish: El desarrollo de la industria ha traído crecimiento económico al país.

example.english: The pharmaceutical industry has increased its sales.
example.spanish: La industria farmacéutica ha incrementado sus ventas.

example.english: Music helps me get inspired.
example.spanish: La música me ayuda a inspirarme.

example.english: He gave me the music for my favorite sonata.
example.spanish: Me dio la partitura para mi sonata favorita.

example.english: She couldn't gather all the necessary information for her paper.
example.spanish: No pudo recopilar toda la información necesaria para su trabajo.

example.english: She still has to enter information in the spreadsheet.
example.spanish: Todavía queda colocar la información en la hoja de cálculo.

example.english: The Palestine nation strives for the recognition of the Palestine state.
example.spanish: La nación palestina lucha por que se reconozca el Estado palestino.

example.english: The political leader faces now the difficult task of uniting a divided nation.
example.spanish: El líder político se enfrenta ahora a la difícil tarea de unificar a un pueblo dividido.

example.english: There are some peculiar insects crawling on the tree.
example.spanish: Hay unos insectos raros arrastrándose por el árbol.

example.english: After being away for a month, I returned to a house full of insects.
example.spanish: Después de estar fuera por un mes, me encontré con una casa llena de bichos al llegar.

example.english: She reads the newspaper every day.
example.spanish: Ella lee el periódico todos los días.

example.english: I don't subscribe to a newspaper.
example.spanish: No suscribo a un diario.

example.english: She has a strong interest in science.
example.spanish: Ella siente un profundo interés por la ciencia.

example.english: Her interests include painting and music.
example.spanish: Sus intereses incluyen la pintura y la música.

example.english: I go to sleep at 11 pm every night.
example.spanish: Me acuesto a las 11 pm todas las noches.

example.english: Should we spend the night, or try and drive back?
example.spanish: No sé si deberíamos quedarnos la noche o tratar de volver.

example.english: The island was surrounded by a coral reef.
example.spanish: La isla estaba rodeada de un arrecife de coral.

example.english: There is an island in the middle of the crosswalk.
example.spanish: Hay una isla en el medio del paso de cebra.

example.english: I have a pimple on my nose.
example.spanish: Tengo un grano en la nariz.

example.english: The horse's nose was really soft.
example.spanish: El hocico del caballo era bien suave.

example.english: She got a job as a librarian.
example.spanish: Consiguió un trabajo de bibliotecaria.

example.english: He is out of a job at the moment.
example.spanish: De momento, está sin empleo.

example.english: He left a note on the fridge so he didn't forget to buy bread.
example.spanish: Dejó una nota en el refrigerador para no olvidarse de comprar pan.

example.english: I listened to what she said and took notes.
example.spanish: Escuché lo que dijo y tomé notas.

example.english: She's an incredible singer. Unfortunately, this recording doesn't do her justice.
example.spanish: Es una cantante increíble. Desgraciadamente, esta grabación no le hace justicia.

example.english: Until we find the killers, there will be no justice.
example.spanish: Hasta que no encontremos a los asesinos, no habrá justicia.

example.english: She has a separate notebook for each of her classes.
example.spanish: Ella tiene un cuaderno separado para cada una de sus clases.

example.english: In my backpack, I have textbooks, notebooks, and pencils.
example.spanish: En mi mochila, tengo libros de texto, libretas y lápices.

example.english: I think I forgot the house key at the gym.
example.spanish: Creo que se me olvidó la llave de la casa en el gimnasio.

example.english: What's the key to access your online account?
example.spanish: ¿Cuál es la clave para acceder a tu cuenta en línea?

example.english: Seven is a prime number.
example.spanish: El siete es un número primo.

example.english: Your passport number doesn't appear on the boarding pass.
example.spanish: Tu número de pasaporte no aparece en la tarjeta de embarque.

example.english: She can type on the keyboard without looking at the keys.
example.spanish: Puede teclear en el teclado sin mirar las teclas.

example.english: I'm learning to play the keyboard.
example.spanish: Estoy aprendiendo a tocar el teclado.

example.english: I found a strange object under the bed.
example.spanish: Encontré un objeto extraño debajo de la cama.

example.english: The object of this school is to develop individual talents.
example.spanish: El objetivo de esta escuela es desarrollar el talento individual.

example.english: Lake Titicaca is the largest in South America.
example.spanish: El lago Titicaca es el más grande de Sudamérica.

example.english: The altar's shine is due to the covering of lake.
example.spanish: El brillo del altar se debe a la capa de laca.

example.english: The deepest point in the ocean is the Mariana Trench.
example.spanish: El punto más profundo del océano es la fosa de las Marianas.

example.english: After two months at sea, we sighted land.
example.spanish: Después de dos meses en alta mar, vimos tierra.

example.english: This land is good for growing corn.
example.spanish: Esta tierra es buena para sembrar maíz.

example.english: I work in an office from 9 am to 5 pm.
example.spanish: Trabajo en una oficina de 9 am a 5 pm.

example.english: I have a meeting in my office and don't want to be interrupted.
example.spanish: Tengo una reunión en mi despacho y no quiero que me interrumpan.

example.english: The book has 500 pages.
example.spanish: El libro tiene 500 páginas.

example.english: Click here to go back to previous page.
example.spanish: Haz clic aquí para volver a la página anterior.

example.english: Class is canceled due to the snow.
example.spanish: La clase está cancelada debido a la nieve.

example.english: How can I get rid of this snow on the screen?
example.spanish: ¿Cómo puedo quitar esta nieve de la pantalla?

example.english: I don't know what to do about my back pain.
example.spanish: No sé qué hacer con mi dolor de espalda.

example.english: I have a pain in my thumb because I jammed it in the door.
example.spanish: Me duele el pulgar porque lo machuqué en la puerta.

example.english: Penelope loves to wear thick socks.
example.spanish: A Penélope le encanta llevar calcetines gordos.

example.english: I need to buy some dress socks before my interview.
example.spanish: Necesito comprar una medias de vestir antes de mi entrevista.

example.english: The printer needs more paper.
example.spanish: La impresora necesita más papel.

example.english: There was an interesting article in the sports section of the paper.
example.spanish: Había un artículo interesante en la sección de deportes del periódico.

example.english: Soldiers quartered in trenches during the war.
example.spanish: Los soldados vivían en trincheras durante la guerra.

example.english: During the war, women raised money to buy supplies for the soldiers.
example.spanish: Durante la guerra, las mujeres recaudaban dinero para comprar provisiones a los militares.

example.english: It's a lovely day for us to go to the park.
example.spanish: Es un lindo día para irnos al parque.

example.english: You can't park a motorcycle in that space.
example.spanish: No puedes estacionar una moto en ese espacio.

example.english: Las flamencas bailaban al son de las palmas y la guitarra.
example.spanish: The flamenco dancers moved to the sound of clapping and guitar.

example.english: Todos mis amigos cubanos saben bailar el son.
example.spanish: All my Cuban friends know how to dance son.

example.english: I'm going to have a party for my 30th birthday.
example.spanish: Voy a celebrar los 30 con una fiesta.

example.english: There's a party in the main square to celebrate the New Year.
example.spanish: Hay pachanga en el Zócalo para celebrar el Año Nuevo.

example.english: Captain, the enemy spacecraft is moving at the speed of sound!
example.spanish: Capitán, ¡el aeronave enemigo se desplaza a la velocidad del sonido!

example.english: What's that sound?
example.spanish: ¿Qué es ese sonido?

example.english: That belongs in the past. It's time to move on.
example.spanish: Eso pertenece al pasado. Es hora de seguir adelante.

example.english: The country is finding it difficult to break free from its past.
example.spanish: Al país le está resultando difícil liberarse de su historia.

example.english: I love to watch how the robins play in the puddles in spring.
example.spanish: Me encanta ver cómo los petirrojos juegan en los charcos en la primavera.

example.english: They walked down to the spring to take a dip.
example.spanish: Fueron caminando hasta el manantial para echarse un chapuzón.

example.english: I hate him because he's not a good person.
example.spanish: Lo odio porque es una mala persona.

example.english: You need to conjugate this verb in the first person.
example.spanish: Tienes que conjugar este verbo en primera persona.

example.english: At night we had a clear view of the stars.
example.spanish: Por la noche veíamos las estrellas con toda claridad.

example.english: The Sun is the king star.
example.spanish: El Sol es el astro rey.

example.english: A picture is worth a thousand words.
example.spanish: Una imagen vale más que mil palabras.

example.english: I took a lot of pictures of my friends at the party.
example.spanish: Le saqué muchas fotos a mis amigas en la fiesta.

example.english: The breakup put her in a terrible state of depression.
example.spanish: La ruptura la puso en un estado terrible de depresión.

example.english: The current state of the government is favorable.
example.spanish: El estado actual del gobierno es favorable.

example.english: Teddy Roosevelt was the 26th president of the United States of America.
example.spanish: Teddy Roosevelt fue el vigésimo sexto presidente de los Estados Unidos de América.

example.english: The president of the company has the final say about the budget assigned to every department.
example.spanish: El presidente de la empresa tiene la última palabra sobre el presupuesto asignado a cada departamento.

example.english: We went to the store to buy some towels.
example.spanish: Fuimos a la tienda a comprar unas toallas.

example.english: The store was closed, so we went to the supermarket instead.
example.spanish: El almacén estaba cerrado, por lo que fuimos al supermercado.

example.english: What's the problem?
example.spanish: ¿Cuál es el problema?

example.english: Can you pick up the kids from school today? - No problem!
example.spanish: ¿Puedes recoger a los niños hoy de la escuela? - ¡No hay problema!

example.english: He's lived on the same street his entire life.
example.spanish: Ha vivido en la misma calle su vida entera.

example.english: As a writer, he's not in the same street as his father.
example.spanish: Como escritor, no está a la altura de su padre.

example.english: We supervise the manufacturing of all our products in-house.
example.spanish: Supervisamos la fabricación de todos nuestros productos internamente.

example.english: The festival's success was the product of the committee members' joint efforts.
example.spanish: El éxito del festival fue el fruto de los esfuerzos conjuntos de los miembros del comité.

example.english: He is a medical student at the University of Puerto Rico.
example.spanish: Es estudiante de medicina en la Universidad de Puerto Rico.

example.english: The brightest students don't always get the best grades.
example.spanish: Los alumnos más brillantes no siempre reciben las mejores notas.

example.english: Hey, don't touch the car. It's not your property.
example.spanish: Oye, no toques el coche. No es de tu propiedad.

example.english: Who owns the property next door?
example.spanish: ¿Quién es el dueño de la propiedad de al lado?

example.english: I rarely add sugar to my coffee.
example.spanish: Rara vez agrego azúcar al café.

example.english: Where is the sugar that I bought?
example.spanish: ¿Dónde está la azúcar que compré?

example.english: Do you have any questions about the procedure?
example.spanish: ¿Tiene alguna pregunta sobre el procedimiento?

example.english: There were ten questions on the exam.
example.spanish: Había diez preguntas en el examen.

example.english: I feel good when the sun is shining.
example.spanish: Me siento bien cuando brilla el sol.

example.english: It is advisable to use sunscreen when you sun yourself.
example.spanish: Es aconsejable utilizar protector solar cuando tomas el sol.

example.english: Miguel won the race.
example.spanish: Miguel ganó la carrera.

example.english: We're all members of the human race regardless of color or creed.
example.spanish: Todos somos miembros de la raza humana sea el que sea el color o credo.

example.english: They want to buy a table and six chairs for the dining room.
example.spanish: Quieren comprar una mesa y seis sillas para el comedor.

example.english: The waiter took the order from our table.
example.spanish: El camarero tomó nota de nuestra mesa.

example.english: Prende el radio que quiero escuchar mi emisora favorita.
example.spanish: Turn on the radio, I want to listen to my favorite station.

example.english: Utiliza el radio del círculo para encontrar su circunferencia.
example.spanish: Use the radius of the circle to find its circumference.

example.english: She is on the telephone right now. Would you like to leave a message?
example.spanish: En este momento está hablando por teléfono. ¿Quieres dejar un mensaje?

example.english: They sell vintage telephones.
example.spanish: Venden teléfonos antiguos.

example.english: If it keeps raining, we can't go to the park.
example.spanish: Si sigue lloviendo, no podemos ir al parque.

example.english: Sam took the umbrella because it's raining.
example.spanish: Sam se llevó el paraguas porque está lloviendo.

example.english: I think we should donate these things to charity.
example.spanish: Creo que debemos donar estas cosas a caridad.

example.english: What is that thing for?
example.spanish: ¿Para qué sirve ese chisme?

example.english: I'm sure she's married because she has a ring on her finger.
example.spanish: Estoy seguro de que está casada porque lleva un anillo en el dedo.

example.english: A diamond ring costs a lot of money.
example.spanish: Una sortija de diamantes cuesta mucho dinero.

example.english: The machine he built allows him to travel through time.
example.spanish: La máquina que construyó le permite viajar en el tiempo.

example.english: Do you remember what time it was exactly?
example.spanish: ¿Recuerdas qué hora era exactamente?

example.english: The river overflowed its banks due to the rain.
example.spanish: El río se desbordó a causa de la lluvia.

example.english: a river of blood
example.spanish: un río de sangre

example.english: These tomatoes look delicious.
example.spanish: Estos tomates se ven deliciosos.

example.english: I'll put some tomato in the salad.
example.spanish: Le pondré jitomate a la ensalada.

example.english: The road to Avonlea is beautiful in the spring.
example.spanish: La carretera a Avonlea está preciosa en primavera.

example.english: The children’s school is down this road on the left.
example.spanish: La escuela de los niños está por esta calle a mano izquierda.

example.english: My town doesn't have a shopping mall or a movie theater.
example.spanish: Mi pueblo no tiene un centro comercial ni un cine.

example.english: If you go into town, would you drop this off at the post office?
example.spanish: Si vas a la ciudad, ¿me llevarías esto a la oficina de correos?

example.english: The beach was full of rocks.
example.spanish: La playa estaba llena de rocas.

example.english: There's a rock in my shoe.
example.spanish: Tengo una piedra en el zapato.

example.english: You’ll need an umbrella in London.
example.spanish: Necesitarás un paraguas en Londres.

example.english: We sat under an umbrella on the beach.
example.spanish: Nos sentamos debajo de una sombrilla en la playa.

example.english: You must follow the rules of the game.
example.spanish: Tienes que seguir las reglas del juego.

example.english: You should study the traffic rules before you take the driver's test.
example.spanish: Debes estudiar las normas de circulación antes de tomar la prueba de conducir.

example.english: The village of Quepos lies in the hills of Costa Rica's pacific coast.
example.spanish: El pueblo de Quepos está ubicado en los cerros de la costa pacífica de Costa Rica.

example.english: The village where I grew up has only 500 residents.
example.spanish: La aldea donde me crié tiene solo 500 residentes.

example.english: The sand on the beach was hot.
example.spanish: La arena de la playa estaba caliente.

example.english: I hired a professional to sand the floors of my house.
example.spanish: Contraté a un profesional para que puliera el suelo de mi casa.

example.english: The war has cost thousands of soldiers and civilians their lives.
example.spanish: La guerra ha costado las vidas de miles de soldados y civiles.

example.english: The two countries have warred over this land for centuries.
example.spanish: Los dos países han combatido por esta tierra durante siglos.

example.english: Their children go to the same school on the bus.
example.spanish: Sus hijos van a la misma escuela en el autobús.

example.english: We have to go back to school at the end of August.
example.spanish: Tenemos que regresar al colegio a finales de agosto.

example.english: What is the quickest way to the airport?
example.spanish: ¿Cuál es el camino más rápido al aeropuerto?

example.english: You still have a long way to get to the hotel.
example.spanish: Todavía te queda mucha distancia por recorrer hasta el hotel.

example.english: The sea covers more than 70% of the Earth's surface.
example.spanish: El mar cubre más del 70% de la superficie de la Tierra.

example.english: These sailors loved the sea more than anything.
example.spanish: Estos marineros amaban la mar más que cualquier otra cosa.

example.english: How's the weather in New York?
example.spanish: ¿Cómo está el clima en Nueva York?

example.english: This region is famous for its awful weather.
example.spanish: Esta región es famosa por su clima horroroso.

example.english: Please take a seat.
example.spanish: Por favor, tome asiento.

example.english: There are no seats left in first class.
example.spanish: No hay asientos libres en primera clase.

example.english: I put on some weight last Christmas.
example.spanish: Subí un poco de peso las pasadas Navidades.

example.english: He goes to the gym to lift weights three times a week.
example.spanish: Él va al gimnasio a levantar pesas tres veces a la semana.

example.english: This car goes from 0 to 60 miles per hour in three seconds.
example.spanish: Este carro acelera de 0 a 60 millas por hora en tres segundos.

example.english: Come here right this second!
example.spanish: ¡Ven aquí este instante!

example.english: His wife is a pediatrician.
example.spanish: Su esposa es pediatra.

example.english: I married my wife four years ago.
example.spanish: Me casé con mi mujer hace cuatro años.

example.english: A sentence must have a verb.
example.spanish: Una oración debe llevar un verbo.

example.english: The teacher asked Eric to read the sentence on the board.
example.spanish: La profesora le pidió a Eric que leyera la frase en el pizarrón.

example.english: We should wind all of these cables so that they're easier to store.
example.spanish: Deberíamos enrollar todos estos cables para que sean más fáciles de guardar.

example.english: The workout winded him to the point that he could barely stand.
example.spanish: El ejercicio lo dejó sin resuello hasta que apenas podía pararse.

example.english: The ship leaves at 6 am loaded with cargo.
example.spanish: El barco zarpa a las 6 am repleto de carga.

example.english: Many merchant ships were sunk during the war.
example.spanish: Muchos buques mercantes fueron hundidos durante la guerra.

example.english: This classroom has big windows.
example.spanish: Este aula tiene ventanas grandes.

example.english: Can you roll down your window? It's too hot!
example.spanish: ¿Puedes bajar tu ventanilla? ¡Hace mucho calor!

example.english: She went to the mall to buy a new pair of shoes.
example.spanish: Ella fue al centro comercial para comprar un nuevo par de zapatos.

example.english: We need to replace the horse's shoes before the next race.
example.spanish: Necesitamos reemplazar las herraduras del caballo antes de la próxima carrera.

example.english: Winter is my least favorite season of the year.
example.spanish: El invierno es mi estación menos favorita del año.

example.english: We've had some terrible winter weather lately.
example.spanish: Últimamente hemos tenido un tiempo invernal terrible.

example.english: Which side of the bed do you prefer to sleep on?
example.spanish: ¿Qué lado de la cama prefieres para dormir?

example.english: She always doodles on the side of her notebook paper.
example.spanish: Ella siempre garabatea en los márgenes del folio de su cuaderno.

example.english: Women should have the same rights as men.
example.spanish: Las mujeres deberían tener los mismos derechos que los hombres.

example.english: Boss, there's a woman at recepction that wants to talk to you.
example.spanish: Jefe, hay una señora en recepción que quiere hablar con usted.

example.english: He put up a "No Parking" sign in his yard.
example.spanish: Puso un letrero que decía "Prohibido estacionarse" en su jardín.

example.english: Didn't you see the sign? U-turns aren't allowed.
example.spanish: ¿No viste la señal? No se permiten vueltas en U.

example.english: We have to write a 500-word essay for class.
example.spanish: Tenemos que escribir un ensayo de 500 palabras para la clase.

example.english: I give you my word that this will not happen again.
example.spanish: Te doy mi palabra de que esto no volverá a pasar.

example.english: What size is your car?
example.spanish: ¿De qué tamaño es su coche?

example.english: What size dress do you want?
example.spanish: ¿De qué talla quieres el vestido?

example.english: There are more than seven billion people in the world.
example.spanish: Hay más de siete mil millones de personas en el mundo.

example.english: After graduation, she plans on entering the business world.
example.spanish: Después de graduación, ella planea entrar en el mundo de los negocios.

example.english: Protect your skin from the sun.
example.spanish: Protege tu piel del sol.

example.english: You need to use a thick moisturizer for your dry skin.
example.spanish: Necesitas usar un hidratante espeso para tu cutis seco.

example.english: I am ten years old and my brother is five.
example.spanish: Tengo diez años y mi hermano tiene cinco.

example.english: This year I'm going to Costa Rica on vacation.
example.spanish: Este año me voy de vacaciones a Costa Rica.

example.english: The sky is overcast.
example.spanish: El cielo está nublado.

example.english: She was about to take the set but mishit the ball and skied it.
example.spanish: Estaba a punto de ganar el set pero golpeó mal la pelota y la lanzó hacia lo alto.

example.english: ¿Qué quieren hacer esta tarde? - Queremos ir al zoo, mamá, a ver a los monos.
example.spanish: What do you want to do this afternoon? - We want to go to the zoo, Mom, to see the monkeys.
